author: saschanaz
body:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3396686/82049756-30cacc80-96b7-11ea-9e77-eaac4d41869c.png)

It also appears as "PowerShell Preview" after installation. I think we want to remove the word.

comments.author: v1d3rm3
comments.body: Here, the installed version (7.0.1) of msix has not been replaced by this 7.0.2 msix version. To use 7.0.2, i have to open "PowerShell Preview" shortcut.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: Need https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/11991 backported to 7.0 servicing branch.  Once this is fixed, we can then publish stable to Store.

comments.author: saschanaz
comments.body: I don't think this is an issue anymore, probably safe to close.

title: MSIX package name still has "Preview" in it
